channel.title: Security warning
channel.description:
Why does it not let me play my webclient? i can't even turn it down to low anymore how can i fix this? it shows this
[img]http://i.imgur.com/M4FCf5X.png[/img]
this is my code and dp link.
[code]<center> <applet name="Arctic Scape" width="765" height="503" archive="https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/7qf2wqf08vl10aw/Arctic%20V1.6.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"/> </applet></center> [/code]
am i suppose to use my .jar dropbox link?
help me please not very good tutorials out there.
